quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: Food is not just eating energy. It's an experience.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: The way we experience the world around us is a direct reflection of the world within us.
name: Gabrielle Bernstein

quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
name: Heraclitus

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
name: Vernon Law

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: An identity would seem to be arrived at by the way in which the person faces and uses his experience.
name: James Baldwin

quote: Nothing ever becomes real till it is experienced.
name: John Keats

quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it's what you do with what happens to you.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills.
name: Minna Antrim

quote: Experience is a dim lamp, which only lights the one who bears it.
name: Louis-Ferdinand Celine

quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you want to run, run a mile. If you want to experience a different life, run a marathon.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: There's a vintage which comes with age and experience.
name: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience.
name: John Locke

quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Any institutions' alumni are key to its growth. We are focused on giving a global experience to our students.
name: Shiv Nadar

quote: I grew up like a neglected weed - ignorant of liberty, having no experience of it.
name: Harriet Tubman

quote: A shirt's not just a shirt. It's the experience of what goes into that shirt.
name: Michael Bastian

quote: A man who carries a cat by the tail learns something he can learn in no other way.
name: Mark Twain

quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: When we shift our perception, our experience changes.
name: Lindsay Wagner

quote: Experience is something you don't get until just after you need it.
name: Steven Wright

quote: The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: The spectacles of experience; through them you will see clearly a second time.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: For me, there is no such thing as a negative experience.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: The reward of suffering is experience.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience.
name: Simon Sinek

quote: My path has not been determined. I shall have more experiences and pass many more milestones.
name: Agnetha Faltskog

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: The value of experience is not in seeing much, but in seeing wisely.
name: William Osler

quote: It is beyond a doubt that all our knowledge begins with experience.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: Adventure is worthwhile.
name: Aesop

quote: Experience is one thing you can't get for nothing.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Architecture is about experience: not only visual but also what you can touch, what you can feel.
name: Ma Yansong

quote: Every outing is a learning experience.
name: Drew Pomeranz

quote: To be a good director, you have to have good life experience. I'm getting there.
name: Thomas Brodie-Sangster

quote: I know it's an experience that I need to have if God's putting me through it.
name: Lil Wayne

quote: See any detour as an opportunity to experience new things.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: True intuitive expertise is learned from prolonged experience with good feedback on mistakes.
name: Daniel Kahneman

quote: Social connection is such a basic feature of human experience that when we are deprived of it, we suffer.
name: Leonard Mlodinow

quote: When we learn from experience, the scars of sin can lead us to restoration and a renewed intimacy with God.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: It's a lovely experience walking around a museum by yourself.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything.
name: Nobu Matsuhisa

quote: America was founded on immigrants. The immigrant experience is common to all of us.
name: Nia Vardalos

quote: The whole world, as we experience it visually, comes to us through the mystic realm of color.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: To me the arcade experience is the ultimate gaming experience.
name: Eugene Jarvis

quote: It's a great, great experience to finally get the reception that you know you rightfully deserve.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: The future should be exciting, you know? It shouldn't be a nerve-wracking experience.
name: Brendon Urie

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
name: Will Rogers

quote: A moment's insight is sometimes worth a life's experience.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I have but one lamp by which my feet are guided, and that is the lamp of experience.
name: Patrick Henry

quote: Judgement comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgement.
name: Simon Bolivar

quote: Experience teaches only the teachable.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Best thing that's happened this year? Maybe Hostel. It was a great experience. I loved it.
name: Jay Hernandez

quote: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Experience is like a comb that life gives you when you are bald.
name: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: The experience of pain or loss can be a formidably motivating force.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: It is only in adventure that some people succeed in knowing themselves - in finding themselves.
name: Andre Gide

quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
name: Henry Ford

quote: It's been said that astronomy is a humbling and, I might add, a character-building experience.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: We shall not grow wiser before we learn that much that we have done was very foolish.
name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: Whoever doesn't know it must learn and find by experience that 'a quiet conscience makes one strong!'
name: Anne Frank

quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: It is a heartening experience to know that you are loved and being missed.
name: Sridevi

quote: There's simply no substitute for experience in terms of aviation safety.
name: Chesley Sullenberger

quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
name: Auguste Rodin

quote: The noblest search is the search for excellence.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: The best thing we can do with rejection is to make it a learning experience - rejection is a great teacher.
name: Adena Friedman

quote: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: The years teach much which the days never know.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Music is your own experience, your own thoughts, your wisdom.
name: Charlie Parker

quote: It is not about gender, it is about experience, leadership, and vision.
name: Angela Ahrendts

quote: Experience praises the most happy the one who made the most people happy.
name: Karl Marx

quote: The words printed here are concepts. You must go through the experiences.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: I don't have to have faith, I have experience.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life.
name: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Innocence can be more powerful than experience.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: All adventures, especially into new territory, are scary.
name: Sally Ride

quote: Playing on the Burj Al Arab helipad was an unforgettable experience, and the view of Dubai was incredible.
name: Ma Long

quote: Experience by itself is not science.
name: Edmund Husserl

quote: Mistakes are painful when they happen, but years later a collection of mistakes is what is called experience.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: The essence of a role-playing game is that it is a group, cooperative experience.
name: Gary Gygax

quote: Every experience, good or bad, is a priceless collector's item.
name: Isaac Marion

quote: It was a strange experience, making a love story and not getting along with your co-star in any way.
name: Ryan Gosling

quote: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation.
name: Isaac D'Israeli

quote: The social element has really transformed the gaming experience.
name: Bobby Kotick

quote: What is the good of experience if you do not reflect?
name: Frederick the Great

quote: Maturity and experience are part of my liberation.
name: Alicia Keys

quote: Every old goalkeeper loses a step at some point, but you can gain that back through experience.
name: Tim Howard

quote: I have learned that a bitter experience can make you stronger.
name: Mel Gibson

quote: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Experience is what you have after you've forgotten her name.
name: Milton Berle

quote: Rejection is the one constant of human experience.
name: Howard Jacobson

quote: Experience: that most brutal of teachers. But you learn, my God do you learn.
name: William Nicholson

quote: Most of the images of reality on which we base our actions are really based on vicarious experience.
name: Albert Bandura

quote: Falling in love as we know it is an addictive experience.
name: Susan Cheever

quote: Our mission is to empower people to experience the world.
name: Gillian Tans

quote: Quality is a direct experience independent of and prior to intellectual abstractions.
name: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: You cannot create experience. You must undergo it.
name: Albert Camus

quote: One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: Customer loyalty comes from consistent experience. They learn to count on you.
name: Jimmy John Liautaud

quote: Life is full of change and uncertainty. We know this. We experience it on a daily basis.
name: Carre Otis

quote: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: To reach something good it is very useful to have gone astray, and thus acquire experience.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Exile is not a time frame. Exile is an experience. It's a sentiment.
name: Marco Rubio

quote: I believe that when people experience an event as a community, it can transcend and change people's lives.
name: Andy Serkis

quote: If you're not willing to work, you're never going to be able to experience the American Dream.
name: Jim Jordan

quote: My purpose in performing is to communicate the joy I experience in living.
name: John Denver

quote: I was lucky to move around different cultures at an early age and have experience of different lifestyles.
name: Paolo Nutini

quote: Age is relative. Experience is relative. And I think often intensity is confused with maturity.
name: Laura Marling

quote: Imagination is a very potent thing, and in the uneducated often usurps the place of genuine experience.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: I've always loved the experience of working together with other people toward an artistic goal.
name: Trey Anastasio

quote: The essence of life is finding something you really love and then making the daily experience worthwhile.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Not to transmit an experience is to betray it.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: The only relevant test of the validity of a hypothesis is comparison of prediction with experience.
name: Milton Friedman

quote: I used to think I'd like to have been a pioneer on the Oregon Trail, experience untamed America.
name: Tracie Peterson

quote: Women have no sympathy and my experience of women is almost as large as Europe.
name: Florence Nightingale

quote: The prism through which you experience life is so unique. There is no objective experience.
name: Sterling K. Brown

quote: Young quarterbacks usually experience bumps in the road. I'll take them in stride.
name: Carson Wentz

quote: In almost everything, experience is more valuable than precept.
name: Quintilian

quote: I make up my own mind in light of available facts, with my own experience and a sense of personal ethics.
name: Ian Anderson

quote: Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect and passion in their operation.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Missionary work has never been easy, and yet the joyful rewards cannot be equaled by any other experience.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: None are so eager to gain new experience as those who don't know how to make use of the old ones.
name: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Sydney's a beautiful city. It was a great experience.
name: Barbara Hershey

quote: People with Parkinson's are not some weird people on the edge of human experience.
name: Helen Mirren

quote: Real love is a permanently self-enlarging experience.
name: M. Scott Peck

quote: Experience is what you get while looking for something else.
name: Federico Fellini

quote: Nothing which has entered into our experience is ever lost.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: My experience as a refugee had made me strong; I could survive anything, even the world of fashion.
name: Alek Wek

quote: It's such a fun experience getting to kind of create something from nothing with your best friend.
name: Maddie Marlow

quote: It is important to express oneself... provided the feelings are real and are taken from your own experience.
name: Berthe Morisot

quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!
name: William Shakespeare

quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I speak to the black experience, but I am always talking about the human condition.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: For me, life is about experience and being a good person.
name: Chris Hemsworth

quote: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
name: Fred Perry

quote: Hands-on experience is the best way to learn about all the interdisciplinary aspects of robotics.
name: Rodney Brooks

quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.
name: Woody Allen

quote: There is science, logic, reason; there is thought verified by experience. And then there is California.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: I'm not a genius. I'm just a tremendous bundle of experience.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Is there anyone so wise as to learn by the experience of others?
name: Voltaire

quote: Kids are watching us. I experience it every single day. They hang on my every word, what I wear, what I say.
name: Michelle Obama

quote: I wasn't a very good student. I prefer to learn by experience.
name: Cristin Milioti

quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: Everybody's got one killer story. It doesn't take talent to tell that story, it just takes experience.
name: Kevin Smith

quote: The more accurately one can illuminate a particular human experience, the better the work of art.
name: Claire Messud

quote: I do write a lot from personal experience, but I also embellish a bit.
name: Miranda Lambert

quote: From start to finish, my experience with 'Moonlight' has been the most unique thing.
name: Trevante Rhodes

quote: When you have really exhausted an experience you always reverence and love it.
name: Albert Camus

quote: But inner experience is only one source of human knowledge.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Men are wise in proportion, not to their experience, but to their capacity for experience.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Recommend virtue to your children; it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Reason, observation, and experience; the holy trinity of science.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
name: Carl Jung

quote: All experience is an arch, to build upon.
name: Henry Adams

quote: But although all our knowledge begins with experience, it does not follow that it arises from experience.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: Learning is a tunnel experience that makes us think more broadly.
name: Anna Deavere Smith

quote: Experience does not err. Only your judgments err by expecting from her what is not in her power.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Experience has shown how deeply the seeds of war are planted by economic rivalry and social injustice.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: The more you are blessed with experience, the fuller and the more enriched you are in your craft.
name: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quote: In my experience, being busy and working hard is the key to sanity/happiness.
name: Jemima Khan

quote: Deep experience is never peaceful.
name: Henry James

quote: Every opportunity I got, I took it as a learning experience.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: Nothing happens quite by chance. It's a question of accretion of information and experience.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: There are some things you only learn through experience.
name: Joe Namath

quote: I'd rather have a lot of talent and a little experience than a lot of experience and a little talent.
name: John Wooden

quote: You have to experience life, make observations, and ask questions.
name: Mos Def

quote: Two things control men's nature, instinct and experience.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Our glory is hidden in our pain, if we allow God to bring the gift of himself in our experience of it.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: The responsibility of a writer is to excavate the experience of the people who produced him.
name: James Baldwin

quote: I've had a wonderful experience here at Penn State.
name: Joe Paterno

quote: To wear a floral shirt is an experience.
name: Brian Wilson

quote: Experience is the only prophecy of wise men.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: There are some hurts that we experience that can be forgiven but we won't forget them.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: The deepest experience of the creator is feminine, for it is experience of receiving and bearing.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I loved the college experience of studying.
name: Bradley Cooper

quote: Loneliness is and always has been the central and inevitable experience of every man.
name: Thomas Wolfe

quote: Example is the best precept.
name: Aesop

quote: What is easy is seldom excellent.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: We have lived long enough to experience the hollowness of earth and the rottenness of all carnal promises.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Sleep - the most beautiful experience in life - except drink.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: The stuff that matters in life is no longer stuff. It's other people. It's relationships. It's experience.
name: Brian Chesky

quote: Never, for the sake of peace and quiet, deny your own experience or convictions.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: It was a great experience for me - the ups and downs - because I became a man in Philadelphia.
name: Allen Iverson

quote: I'm a culture vulture, and I just want to experience it all.
name: Debbie Harry

quote: Everything about aging in my experience so far has been a plus. Except the death part!
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: The only thing we have learnt from experience is that we learn nothing from experience.
name: Chinua Achebe

quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: In my own experience as a physician, I have not seen a miraculous healing, and I don't expect to see one.
name: Francis Collins

quote: If merely 'feeling good' could decide, drunkenness would be the supremely valid human experience.
name: William James

quote: Pain is the most private experience, but its causes, whether natural or man-made, demand public accounting.
name: Nancy Gibbs

quote: All that I know I learned after I was thirty.
name: Georges Clemenceau

quote: Experience really does make you better, man.
name: Alan Vega

quote: Characterization is integral to the theatrical experience.
name: Robert Ludlum

quote: Good judgement comes from experience. Experience comes from bad judgement.
name: Jim Horning

quote: Each of us brings to our job, whatever it is, our lifetime of experience and our values.
name: Sandra Day O'Connor

quote: Experience is the child of thought, and thought is the child of action.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: You don't take a class; you're thrown into motherhood and learn from experience.
name: Jennie Finch

quote: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: Experience is what enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: I didn't think; I experimented.
name: Anthony Burgess

quote: As an artist, the more experience, the better the creation. I'm a very positive person.
name: Psy

quote: I love music, and after my first experience with movies, I can't wait to do more.
name: Rihanna

quote: Proverbs are short sentences drawn from long experience.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Faces are the ledgers of our experience.
name: Richard Avedon

quote: No experience exists unless it's a shared one.
name: Alexa Chung

quote: Experience shows that if you put more ethicists on a problem, you can end up with more problems.
name: Gregory Benford

quote: So it's, I think it's quite, quite unique to fly with somebody with so much experience.
name: Philippe Perrin

quote: I was a wild, mischievous kid, and I had tremendous imagination. Any experience I had, I'd try to reenact it.
name: Adrien Brody

quote: Extreme programming is an emotional experience.
name: Kent Beck

quote: Language is not simply a reporting device for experience but a defining framework for it.
name: Benjamin Whorf

quote: My goal as a puzzle designer is to create a meaningful experience for the player, not just 'I solved it.'
name: Scott Kim

quote: The head learns new things, but the heart forever practices old experiences.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Language fits over experience like a straight-jacket.
name: William Golding

quote: The experience of God, or in any case the possibility of experiencing God, is innate.
name: Alice Walker

quote: See, when I paint, it is an experience that, at its best, is transcending reality.
name: Keith Haring

quote: You are about to have your first experience with a Greek lunch. I will kill you if you pretend to like it.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: I deepen my experience of God through prayer, meditation, and forgiveness.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: Experience enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
name: Franklin P. Jones

quote: 'Harry Potter' shouldn't be children's first experience with suspense and plot turns.
name: Berkeley Breathed

quote: When you're an actor or any kind of artist, you use your life as something to draw from in every experience.
name: Josh Peck

quote: Not the fruit of experience, but experience itself, is the end.
name: Walter Pater

quote: The visuals are equally as important as the music. It's all a complete experience.
name: Andra Day

quote: A novel usually begins, in my experience, with a thought or image that won't leave me alone.
name: John Lanchester

quote: Good judgement comes from experience. Sometimes, experience comes from bad judgement.
name: Christian Slater

quote: The creation of my cosmetics experience has been years in the making.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: There is nothing so easy to learn as experience and nothing so hard to apply.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Experience is a good school. But the fees are high.
name: Heinrich Heine

quote: Conviction without experience makes for harshness.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Experience is a great teacher.
name: John Legend

quote: The first essential in writing about anything is that the writer should have no experience of the matter.
name: Isadora Duncan

quote: Music commands how we feel, dictates what we experience in our feelings.
name: Sheryl Crow

quote: 'Faith and Will' sprang from my personal experience with passing through a dark spiritual time.
name: Julia Cameron

quote: My music is about the journey, about love and the human experience.
name: Wynonna Judd

quote: The main thing experience has taught me is that one has to sort of hone their relationship to time, you know.
name: John Frusciante

quote: Experience teaches us that we do not always receive the blessings we ask for in prayer.
name: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: Where you are in consciousness has everything to do with what you see in experience.
name: Eric Butterworth

quote: All adventure is now reactionary.
name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quote: Personal experience is the basis of all real Literature.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: I eventually became proud of my strikeouts, because each one represented another learning experience.
name: Willie Stargell

quote: I can understand a family that's imploding. I have experience of that in my own life.
name: Abi Morgan

quote: By experience we find out a short way by a long wandering.
name: Roger Ascham

quote: It is costly wisdom that is bought by experience.
name: Roger Ascham

quote: Your life will be a blessed and balanced experience if you first honor your identity and priority.
name: Russell M. Nelson

quote: I go by instinct - I don't worry about experience.
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: If we could sell our experiences for what they cost us, we'd all be millionaires.
name: Pauline Phillips

quote: An optimist is a guy that has never had much experience.
name: Don Marquis

quote: What one has not experienced, one will never understand in print.
name: Isadora Duncan

quote: You don't cheat anybody out of their experience, whatever it is.
name: Andre Agassi

quote: Every moment is an experience.
name: Jake Roberts

quote: Our experience is composed rather of illusions lost than of wisdom acquired.
name: Joseph Roux

quote: The soul is everlasting, and its learning experience is lifetime after lifetime.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: Ulta is a great place for our vendor partners to experience growth.
name: Mary Dillon

quote: We are each responsible for all of our experiences.
name: Louise L. Hay

quote: I think we are a product of all our experiences.
name: Sanford I. Weill

quote: Experiences are savings which a miser puts aside. Wisdom is an inheritance which a wastrel cannot exhaust.
name: Karl Kraus

quote: Our wisdom comes from our experience, and our experience comes from our foolishness.
name: Sacha Guitry

quote: Good judgment comes from experience and experience comes from bad judgment.
name: Fred Brooks

quote: All experience is subjective.
name: Gregory Bateson

quote: Everything is discursive opinion instead of direct experience.
name: A. R. Ammons

quote: Information's pretty thin stuff unless mixed with experience.
name: Clarence Day

quote: Tragedy makes you grow up.
name: Jane Campion

quote: I think in most jobs, you get better as you get older. You gain experience, you gain knowledge.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: Few people even scratch the surface, much less exhaust the contemplation of their own experience.
name: Randolph Bourne

quote: Bitter experience has taught us how fundamental our values are and how great the mission they represent.
name: Jan Peter Balkenende

quote: Color is an intense experience on its own.
name: Jim Hodges

quote: It was also my experience at Hull-House that aroused my interest in industrial diseases.
name: Alice Hamilton

quote: Explorers have to be ready to die lost.
name: Russell Hoban

quote: Judgment comes from experience - and experience comes from bad judgment.
name: Walter Wriston
